cards.title: RF001 - Technical Design & Architecture
cards.description:
Create detailed technical design for Gerenciamento de Oráculos. **Descrição**: Criar, editar, deletar, listar, clonar Oráculos com tipagem (Frontend vs Backend)

**Tipos de Oráculos**:

1. **Oráculo Backend** (`type: "backend"`):
   - Gera APIs REST/GraphQL para g

acceptance_criteria: Technical design document created covering Camada 1 - Oráculo
cards.business_value: Ensures Gerenciamento de Oráculos is built correctly and maintainable

cards.title: RF001 - Backend Implementation
cards.description: Implement backend for Gerenciamento de Oráculos. Technologies: PostgreSQL, Redis, NebulaGraph

cards.description: Implement UI for Gerenciamento de Oráculos. Create responsive, accessible interface using React/Next.js.

cards.business_value: Provides user interface for Gerenciamento de Oráculos

cards.title: RF062 - Technical Design & Architecture
cards.description:
Create detailed technical design for Production-Grade desde o Dia 1. **Descrição**: Código gerado é production-ready imediatamente

**Requisitos**:
- Type-safe (Go, TypeScript, Python)
- Error handling completo
- Logging e observability (estruturado, rastreável)
- Perf
cards.user_story: As a Tech Lead, I want to design the architecture for Production-Grade desde o Dia 1, so that the implementation follows best practices and integrates with existing layers.
acceptance_criteria: Technical design document created covering Camada 5 - Interfaces
cards.business_value: Ensures Production-Grade desde o Dia 1 is built correctly and maintainable
